    edu.ucla.sspace.text

    • Uses of DocumentPreprocessor in edu.ucla.sspace.text

      Constructors in edu.ucla.sspace.text with parameters of type DocumentPreprocessor 
      Constructor and Description
      DirectoryCorpusReader(DocumentPreprocessor processor)
      Constructs a new DirectoryCoprusReader that uses processor to pre-process any raw text extracted from a corpus file.
